Class Deck

java.lang.Object
com.dnikitin.poker.model.Deck
public class Deck extends Object
Represents a standard 52-card deck.

Data Structure: Uses a LinkedList to function as a Stack (LIFO) or Queue (FIFO), allowing efficient removal of cards from the "top" of the deck via LinkedList.removeFirst().

Security: Uses SecureRandom (CSPRNG) instead of standard Random to ensure the shuffle permutation is unpredictable, preventing card prediction attacks.
